Description:
PERFECT FOR FIRST HOME, INVESTOR OR DOWNSIZER
Situated on a corner block in a peaceful location, is this 3 bedroom home ready to buy. A tiled entrance leads you to the master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite, to the left. A versatile floor plan could allow for 2 spacious living areas and a formal dining room or even 3 living spaces. The well appointed kitchen includes walk in pantry, dishwasher, gas upright stove and spacious meals area. Off the kitchen/meals area is a hallway leading to 2 further bedrooms, family bathroom with separate toilet and laundry with storage. The meals area opens onto an outdoor entertaining space overlooking a fernery. The storage space outside is an added bonus to this property. There is a double carport with roller door as well as a large undercover space to the side of this, perfect for a caravan, boat or extra cars. A 6x8 shed with concrete floor and power completes the package. The home is located close to the bush and walking trails as well as local schools and shops.
Insights: 19 Kilby Court, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2018 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
Opportunity knocks - Family home built 2010 with planning permit for two lot sub-division!
- Lovely 3 Brm family home (2010), master with ensuite and walk in robe
- Corner allotment (754m2) and planning permit for two lot sub-division in place
- Ducted gas heating and evaporative cooling for all seasons
- Modern kitchen with meals and family area
- Double garage, alfresco, good fencing with second proposed allotment fenced
- Yes, the Melbourne side of Bendigo close to all amenities
- Currently leased at $340 making this the perfect investment - Low maintenance home
- Ideal home for the family wanting a large 754m2 block
This lovely family home is located in a great location and being a corner allotment with a planning permit in place for a two lot sub-division, it is ideal for the investor. Yes, already tenanted at $340 per week so a regular income whilst you complete the sub-division to sell off the rear allotment. A fabulous opportunity for those into sub-division, no risks and a lovely 2010 home already leased. Of course for the family it is perfect as it is and no need to subdivide if you wish to retain the full 754m2.

Description:
Invest or nest - current return $300 per week
Located close to natural bush and the Kangaroo Flat lake, this home could suit a variety of purposes to the new owner. Featuring 3 bedrooms (2 with BIR'S), large living room with new carpet, spacious kitchen/meals area with lovely out look, gas hot water, cooking and heating plus ducted evaporative cooling. Secured on a corner allotment, the home has a single carport come entertainment area, second drive way parking for car, trailer or caravan. Perfect for downsizing or investment with the current tenants paying $300 per week rent on a month to month basis.

Description:
Approved 4 Lot Subdivision
This large allotment offers a great opportunity for a residential development close to all the major amenities.
Sitting at the front of this 1,019m² block you will find the fully renovated weatherboard home, comprising of 3 good sized bedrooms, main with built in robes. Three-piece bathroom with vanity, shower and toilet.
Large kitchen with polished floorboards throughout for easy living.
Other features include; Gas heater & reverse cycle split system in the main lounge area and solar panels offering low power bills.
This property is currently returning $320 per week with great tenants in place, making it a great investment.
Are you a developer? or perhaps an astute investor looking to add to their portfolio. Look no further!!!
This is an incredibly rare chance to secure a piece of property in a popular and rapidly growing area of Bendigo that offers 95% completion of civil construction and very little left to spend before beginning construction on 3 Town Houses (floorplans included).
Invest, develop, this property covers all bases. Enquiries welcomed.

Description:
MODERN FAMILY HOME IN IMMACULATE CONDITION
This spectacular home has everything a buyer could want and more, in a quiet court with views of the surrounding bushland. The moment you step off the Merbau decking entry onto the large polished porcelain floor tiles, you will be wowed by the class and attention to detail of this house that must be seen to be believed.
All 4 large bedrooms have BIRs, block out blinds, ceiling fans plus a bonus walk in robe with a double shower and double basin in the master bedroom. The open plan kitchen, dining and living area has views of the large wrap around deck, alfresco area with adjoining pergola covering a built in BBQ and large bench space with more than enough space to entertain.
The spacious modern kitchen is equipped with loads of storage and bench space made of beautiful Caesarstone tops complete with dishwasher, double sink and island bench with plenty of seating space. The kitchen also comprises of a 900mm stainless steel oven, 5 burner gas cooktop, stylish glass splash back and a large walk in butler's pantry to finish off this kitchen perfectly.
• 2nd living area called the kids retreat is great for families wanting another
play space/lounge area away from the main living area.
• Cinema/3rd living area with sliding doors for complete privacy.
• Two large bathrooms plus a powder room
• Fully landscaped low maintenance yard, back and front consists of palm
trees and a number of natives/drought tolerant trees/plants
• Stencil concrete entertaining area
• Side access wide enough for trailer or a small caravan
• Soft closing pot draws
• Ducted heating and cooling throughout the entire home
• 3 remote electric garage roller door
• 4.5 KW solar panels (to keep your ever increasing electricity bill down)
• Solar/gas hot water
• In ground sprinkler system on lawn
• All windows and doors are key lockable
• 3x3 garden shed with concrete floor
• Oversized double garage
• Energy efficient downlights throughout, including outdoor alfresco area
• Master and front 2 bedrooms have privacy blinds (you can see out but
people cannot see in)
• Large laundry with plenty of storage in the double cupboards
• 2 Large linen cupboards for extra storage space
• Built in speaker system in outdoor entertaining area
• 2550mm high ceilings throughout

Description:
Walk to the Shops
Tucked away in a quiet court off Carpenter Street is this neat & tidy home within walking distance to all the ammenities Kangaroo Flat has to offer. This classic home retains some original features throughout and it has a functional layout including a large lounge adjoining the wrap around kitchen with the dining table centred providing a spot with plenty of natural light. With three good sized bedrooms the home would suit a growing family and the benefits dont stop there, other features include;
Ducted gas floor heating, lounge gas heater and reverse cycle air conditioner
Security doors on front & back
Concreted undercover outdoor area with access ramp to the home
Shedding - 7 x 5 mtr with concrete floor, power & automatic door, additional 4 x 3 mtr workshop
Durable vinyl exterior
With the location and an appraised rental value of $280 per week this home would make a perfect investment, please feel free to contact our friendly team to view today.

Description:
SKILFULLY BUILT FIRST TIME FOR SALE
Poised atop an oversized double garage that includes a workshop, this home encompasses sweeping elevated views and gentle breezes from every window. Built by meticulous Builder, John Pearce and lovingly owned by the one family, the home is awash with sunlight and radiates a welcoming family atmosphere. Offering spacious formal lounge with picturesque views, family, meals and well-equipped kitchen with ample cupboard and bench space. Flooded with sunlight, the quaint rear sunroom adjacent and sheltered back porch both overlook leafy gardens within the neat and tidy backyard. All 3 bedrooms are equipped with built-in robes with 2 rooms being especially generous in size, and all are serviced by the nearby family bathroom and separate toilet. Outdoors offers flourishing front gardens, rear fernery, double length carport behind gated security and plenty of storage options with a handy garden shed and huge amounts of under house storage, which could also double as a wonderful cellar for the wine enthusiast. Relish in this wonderful streetscape and convenient location, so handy to schools, shops and within easy reach of the Kangaroo Flat sports club. A rare window of opportunity for home buyers looking to secure a superb home where all you need to do is move in, relax and enjoy!

Description:
One with the lot with equity
Introducing itself to visitors with a facade featuring finials, and return verandah with timber fretwork and turned wooden posts, this family-friendly home promotes happiness and harmony. Step inside to find a welcoming interior, well-warmed in wintery weather and cooled in summer swelter by ducted heating along with split system air conditioning.
A flexible floorplan and vast living zones allow variance of furniture configurations and room uses. For instance, with so much space for a desk elsewhere, the study could be a 5th bedroom or do double duty as a guest room. A bay window in the master bedroom is ideal for creating a cosy retreat, and if formal dining is not required, perhaps lounge and music or games room?
Complete with stainless steel gas cooktop, electric wall oven and dishwasher, the galley kitchen has abundant cabinetry, including small appliance cupboard. The aftermath of mealtime mayhem is kindly concealed from diners behind a raised splashback. An abundance of space here is also perfect for supervising homework at the breakfast bar or dining table, or youngsters at play either indoors or beyond in the fully-fenced yard.
Beckoning barbeques with family and friends, a brilliant undercover entertaining area is handy for sheltering kids and pets alfresco too. Alongside is a you-beaut shed with concrete floor, power and roller door, plus vehicle access via a double carport.
Just a few minutes' walk from both primary school and secondary college, with scope for updates at your leisure to increase equity, this home has it all!

Description:
5 Bedroom Family Home
Presented impeccably this is an incredibly welcoming property that will have you feeling at home immediately. With fantastic street appeal and a spacious functional floor plan including formal lounge and formal dining rooms.
Beautifully located this four bedroom, two bathroom plus study family home is sure to impress even the most fastidious of buyers.
Stepping inside you will find the master suite to your left with walk in robe and large double vanity ensuite bathroom. The home office or fifth bedroom is conveniently placed just across the hall.
Moving on down the entry hallway you will find the central hub of the home. With massive open-plan kitchen and meals area boasting stainless steel appliances, blanco oven and walk in pantry.
The climate will be comfortable all year round with ducted evaporative cooling and gas heating.
At the rear of the home, private and separate to the rest of the house you will find the three remaining bedrooms. All with built in robes and of generous size. They are connected via the hallway to the formal dining room.
The kitchen family room extends outdoors to a massive alfresco area for easy entertaining overlooking the lush lawn. The backyard is the ideal size for a friendly game of cricket.
With large bedrooms and modern finishes, this could be just the home you've been patiently waiting for.

Description:
Unpolished Gem Ready For A Makeover!
This very central position is just a short stroll to Lansell Plaza as well as Aldi, IGA and the Kangaroo Flat Shopping Strip just up the road, together with the Leisure Centre and soon to be completed new Pool complex. Medical centres and schools are also not far away.
From the porch, glass panel double doors open to a wide hallway and a very spacious lounge featuring lovely timber flooring which also graces the 3 bedrooms. All bedrooms have picture rails, the main with a wall of robes and the second with some re-stumping needed. The central bathroom has a tiled floor, shower over bath and a timber fronted vanity, while the large kitchen has an electric upright stove, original cabinetry and a unique and original Metters wood stove still in place. With high ceilings and decorative cornice, the home has an air-conditioner, gas wall furnace and an attractive brick surround to a disconnected oil heater, which would make a lovely setting for perhaps a gas log fire.
Outside is a small covered entertainment area, carport, fully fenced deep back yard with storage shed and the bonus of three fruit trees.
This is excellent value in a terrific location, so make an appointment today.
Property Code: 861

Description:
The Perfect Low-Maintenance Investment Opportunity
Situated in a quiet location and set back from the road is this low maintenance unit offering modern features throughout including; an open plan kitchen, meals and living area. Kitchen offering stainless steel appliances, a dishwasher, a great sized pantry and plenty of cupboard space. The meals area leads directly out to the neat and tidy courtyard, which requires minimum upkeep.
Internally you'll find two bedrooms, each with built in robes and sitting at the front of the unit allowing gorgeous sunlight to flow through the rooms.
The centrally located bathroom is spacious and comprises of a big shower plus a bath with a separate toilet. There is also a generous laundry with internal access to the single lock up garage. Heating and cooling is also taken care of with a split system for year-round comfort.
This neat, tidy and pleasantly spacious unit is a must to inspect! Investors will be delighted by the attractive returns of $270 per week in which the current tenants are paying whilst taking immaculate care of the property!
Situated less than 10 minutes from the Bendigo CBD this property is a fantastic find, all amenities at your doorstep with ALDI, Chemist Warehouse and Medical facilities just around the corner you will not have to travel far.

Step onto the timber decked entry and open the front door to a real wow factor of the timber polished boards. Offering a multitude of uses this room, the family room could be either another family room or 4th bedroom, so a very versatile property depending on your needs. Add to the list 3 pce bathroom, laundry, internal access from double garage, fantastic large timber decked entertaining area with glass water feature. The added bonus of this property is it has just had new carpet laid throughout the whole house, overall this quality home is low maintenance and the external is well designed with landscaping and all the hard work is done, just move in and enjoy!

Description:
Beautifully renovated family friendly home
The front veranda and established gardens create fantastic street appeal on this renovated weatherboard home. The current owners renovated the property when they were living here, converting it into a comfortable modern home. With an amazing kitchen comprising of white profile cabinetry of soft close drawers, dark laminate benchtops and a 800mm stainless steel Smeg brand oven, the culinary enthusiasts will definitely be satisfied. Beautiful floating timber floors in the kitchen and the hallways are also a nice touch. The lounge adjoining the kitchen and dining is a good size and has quality carpet, a gas log fire and a split system. Each of the 3 bedrooms also have their own split systems and comprise of built in robes. The main bathroom is gorgeous with a claw foot bath, shower and vanity. Stepping out the back door you'll find a fantastic veranda spanning the entire back of the house; the perfect area for entertaining friends and family during the warmer months. The backyard is also ideal for family living with plenty of space for the kids to run around in. Further up the backyard is an above ground pool - the kids will love this too! Two garden sheds, a single garage/workshop as well as a huge carport and a 2KW solar system complete the package. Estimated rental of $290 - $300 p/wk.

Address: Unit 43 Karinya Gardens (1-11 Furness St) Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555
Description:
Retire in Style
Positioned next to the bowling green, this lovely two-bedroom villa located in the Karinya Gardens Residential Village offers very affordable, independent living for over 55s.
Upon arrival you notice the adorable front porch presents a nice spot to sit with your morning coffee and admire the garden and nature reserve. The open plan living area includes a lounge, kitchen and dining space. The cathedral ceiling enhances the spaciousness. The kitchen has a 600mm electric wall oven, 4 burner gas cooktop, slimline dishwasher, pantry and plenty of additional storage. Off the lounge room is a separate study with double sliding doors – great space for a small home office or craft space.
The bedrooms are a good size – the main bedroom has a built-in robe, ceiling fan and TV stand. The remaining bedroom also has a ceiling fan and two built-in robes for extra storage.
The bathroom has 900mm x 1200mm shower and a long vanity with ample built-in storage. The separate toilet is adjacent. The European laundry is neatly hidden away behind sliding doors near the backdoor.
Outside there is a single carport space, a fenced off outdoor entertaining area, two garden sheds and a clothesline. The front bay window, porch and carport benefit from external awnings for keeping the home cooler in summer.
Heating and cooling are taken care of with an efficient Rinnai gas heater, a reverse cycle split system and ceiling fans.
Set in lovely garden surrounds, village residents enjoy a relaxed, low maintenance lifestyle amid like-minded neighbours with the added benefit of community facilities such as CCTV security, community centre incorporating lounge, kitchen, library, meeting room, gym, cinema, indoor/outdoor bowling, workshop/woodworking room and has a place to store the boat or caravan between trips.
It's a short walk to Lansell Square shopping centre with public transport at the front and walking tracks nearby. Call for further information about Unit 43 today.

Description:
LOVINGLY RENOVATED 3 BEDROOM PLUS BUNGALOW
This lovely three bedroom weatherboard home has been recently fully renovated throughout. On entering the home you will be clearly impressed by the choices the current owners have made with the renovation. All three bedrooms are spacious and feature built in robes and ceiling fans. The bathroom is fresh and modern with crisp white décor. The large lounge room, complete with split system unit and ceiling fan opens onto the kitchen and adjoining dining area. The modern kitchen includes gas and electric cooking facilities, dishwasher, plenty of bench space and walk in pantry. The separate bungalow is an added bonus. It has been designed as a separate bedroom and living room. This would be ideal as a teenagers retreat or perfect for when guests come to visit. Alternatively this space could be utilised as storage, workshop options or even a home office. Externally the property offers beautifully presented gardens, rear shade sail for sun protection and is the perfect backyard for small families and pets. All this is within walking distance to the hub of Kangaroo Flat with shops supermarkets and various food outlets only 500m away and schools and public transport in close proximity. The perfect property for investors, with a current excellent rental return, young families or first home buyers, an inspection will not disappoint.

Description:
Investor/Developer or Lifestyle Property!
This traditional red brick home with tiled roof is situated right in the heart of Kangaroo Flat, opposite IGA and the fire station, close to doctors, schools & kinder. Main street shopping and dining, public transport, sporting facilities & Kangaroo Flat railway station are just a short walk away. It has three bedrooms, one bathroom with shower, hip bath, vanity & toilet. The cosy lounge has an open wood fire & overhead fan, separate dining room, and central timber kitchen with a 900mm stainless steel electric oven & gas hot plates, the hardwood floors are just waiting to be polished. Separate laundry with storage, and charming patio garden complete with functioning outhouse for gardening convenience. Sited on 1020m2 allotment with huge potential for subdivision (STCA). Loads of shedding, single carport & a garage.
Insights: 2 Carpenter Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2018 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
Rosedale Retirement Village
Located a short stroll to Lansell Square shopping centre this secure home has all the mod cons and the bonus of an additional space that could be a study, sewing room or second lounge ( a rare find at a great price ). Entering from the front porch you are greeted with a large open plan lounge/dining area that adjoins the kitchen with good storage space, dishwasher & full cooking facilities. Both bedrooms have built in robes and ceiling fans, close by is the bathroom that features a large shower, vanity & toilet. With undercover parking for a car and a smartly built in garden shed there is room for additional storage of those bulky items. To inspect the property please contact Nathan Diss on 0448010057.
